      • existsInDB

        public static boolean existsInDB(IEntityType type,
                                 java.lang.String publicId,
                                 boolean includeRetired)
        Queries the database for an entity with the given type and publicId (including or not including retired rows based on the includeRetired parameter). If such an entity is found, returns true.
        Parameters:
        type - type of the entity
        publicId - public ID of the entity to find in the DB
        includeRetired - whether or not to include retired entities in the query
        Returns:
        true if and only if an entity is found in the database

      • archive

        public static PolicyPeriod archive(PolicyPeriod period,
                                   PolicyPeriod... otherPeriods)
        Deletes messages for all of the passed periods and runs work queues. Then archives period and returns the reloaded archived version from the database. Does not validate before archiving.

        Note: Usually, the union of period and otherPeriods will correspond with all of the periods in the term.
        Parameters:
        period - Period to archive
        otherPeriods - Other periods in the term that may need to have messages deleted
        Returns:
        The archived period, reloaded from the database

      • archive

        public static PolicyPeriod archive(boolean validate,
                                   PolicyPeriod period,
                                   PolicyPeriod... otherPeriods)
        Deletes messages for all of the passed periods and runs work queues. Then archives period and returns the reloaded archived version from the database.

        Note: Usually, the union of period and otherPeriods will correspond with all of the periods in the term.
        Parameters:
        validate - Whether or not to run validation before archiving
        period - Period to archive
        otherPeriods - Other periods in the term that may need to have messages deleted
        Returns:
        The archived period, reloaded from the database

      • archiveOnly

        public static PolicyPeriod archiveOnly(boolean validate,
                                       PolicyPeriod period)
        Archives period and returns the reloaded archived version from the database.
        Parameters:
        validate - Whether or not to run validation before archiving
        period - Period to archive
        Returns:
        The archived period, reloaded from the database

      • archiveOnly

        public static void archiveOnly(boolean validate,
                               PolicyTerm term)
        Archives term.
        Parameters:
        validate - Whether or not to run validation before archiving
        term - Term to archive

      • restore

        public static PolicyPeriod restore(PolicyPeriod period)
        Restores the passed period's term from the archive, then returns the reloaded, restored version from the database. Creates success / failure activities for the passed user and with the passed reason.
        Parameters:
        period - Period to restore
        Returns:
        The restored period, reloaded from the database

        public static void resetArchiveFileByteTotal()
